description.value: The problem episode of which this condition is part of. The episodicity type (Review, Flare, End) indicates the type of relationship that exists between this follow-on condition and the target problem episode.

short.value: The problem episode this condition is part of.

definition.value: The problem episode of which this condition is part of. The episodicity type (Review, Flare, End) indicates the type of relationship that exists between this follow-on condition and the target problem episode.
The type of relationship that exists between a follow-on condition and the target problem onset.

comments.value: Allows the specification of the relationship type between a follow-on condition and the target problem onset - review | flare | end

definition.value: A reference to the problem episode of which this condition is part of.
